arts.ttl: Martin O'Neill issues statement ahead of return to Celtic dugout vs Falkirk
arts.sum: Martin O'Neill issues statement ahead of return to Celtic dugout vs Falkirk

CELTIC take on Falkirk at Parkhead this evening for the second time this season as they pursue three much-needed points in the bid for a fifth successive title. Martin O’Neill takes charge of the team in an interim capacity along with assistant Shaun Maloney after Monday’s shock resignation by Brendan Rodgers. The champions go into [...]

arts.ttl: Celtic vs Falkirk – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Celtic and Falkirk face off at Celtic Park on Wednesday night in what promises to be a crucial Scottish Premiership encounter. Celtic vs Falkirk – Match Preview and Team News Date: Wednesday, 29th October. Kick-off: 8:45pm BST. Venue: Celtic Park, Glasgow. Celtic Team News Celtic are navigating a significant injury crisis ahead of this fixture under new interim […] The post Celtic vs Falkirk – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

Celtic have suffered back-to-back Scottish Premiership defeats for the first time since December 2023, but it had been even longer than that since Falkirk had clinched consecutive top-flight victories...
